entry.ubl-definition: A document used to request payment.
entry.definition: Documento utilizado para requerir un pago.

entry.ubl-definition: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.
entry.definition: La versión de esquema UBL 2 para este tipo de documento que define todos los elementos que se podrían encontrar en una instancia.

entry.ubl-definition: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.
entry.definition: Identifica una personalización de UBL definida por un usuario o colectivo para un uso específico.

entry.ubl-definition: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.
entry.definition: Identifica el perfil de personalización de UBL que se está utilizando.

entry.ubl-definition: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.
An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.
entry.definition: Número único asignado a la Factura por el Vendedor (facturador).

entry.ubl-definition: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).
entry.definition: Indica si un documento es una copia (verdad) o no (falso).

entry.ubl-definition: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.
entry.definition: Identificador único universal para una instancia de este ABIE.

entry.ubl-definition: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.
entry.definition: Fecha en que se emitió la Factura asignada por el Vendedor.

entry.ubl-definition: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.
entry.definition: Hora en que se emitió la Factura asignada por el Vendedor.

entry.ubl-definition: The date on which Invoice is due.
A code signifying the type of the Invoice.
entry.definition: Código que especifica el tipo de Factura.

entry.ubl-definition: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.
entry.definition: Texto en formato libre que aplica a la Factura. Puede contener notas o cualquier otra información similar que no esté contenida de forma explícita en ninguna otra estructura.

entry.ubl-definition: The date of the Invoice, used to indicate the point at which tax becomes applicable.
entry.definition: Fecha de la Factura, utilizada para indicar el momento en el que los impuestos serán aplicables.

entry.ubl-definition: A code signifying the default currency for this document.
entry.definition: Moneda en que se presenta el Documento. Puede ser la misma moneda que la de los precios o impuestos.

entry.ubl-definition: A code signifying the currency used for tax amounts in the Invoice.
entry.definition: Moneda en que se expresan los impuestos en el documento.

entry.ubl-definition: A code signifying the currency used for prices in the Invoice.
entry.definition: Moneda en que se especifican los precios.

entry.ubl-definition: A code signifying the currency used for payment in the Invoice.
entry.definition: Moneda utilizada para el pago.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Payment Alternative_ Currency Code. Code
entry.ubl-definition: A code signifying the alternative currency used for payment in the Invoice.
entry.definition: Moneda que se puede utilizar para pagar de forma alternativa.

entry.ubl-definition: The buyer's accounting code, applied to the Invoice as a whole.
entry.definition: Código contable del comprador aplicado al conjunto de la factura.

entry.ubl-definition: The buyer's accounting code, applied to the Invoice as a whole, expressed as text.
entry.definition: Centro de coste contable del comprador aplicado al conjunto de la factura, expresado como texto.

entry.ubl-definition: The number of lines in the document.
entry.definition: Número de líneas de detalle.

entry.ubl-definition: A reference provided by the buyer used for internal routing of the document.
A period to which the Invoice applies.
entry.definition: Asociación con el período o períodos a los que aplica la Factura.

entry.ubl-definition: A reference to the Order with which this Invoice is associated.
entry.definition: Asociación con una Referencia a un Pedido

entry.ubl-definition: A reference to a billing document associated with this document.
entry.definition: Asociación con Referencias de Facturación.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Despatch_ Document Reference. Document Reference
entry.ubl-definition: A reference to a Despatch Advice associated with this document.
entry.definition: Referencia asociativa con Albaranes de Entrega.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Receipt_ Document Reference. Document Reference
entry.ubl-definition: A reference to a Receipt Advice associated with this document.
entry.definition: Referencia asociativa con Avisos de Recepción.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Statement_ Document Reference. Document Reference
entry.ubl-definition: A reference to a Statement associated with this document.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Originator_ Document Reference. Document Reference
entry.ubl-definition: A reference to an originator document associated with this document.
entry.definition: Referencia asociativa con Documento Original.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Contract_ Document Reference. Document Reference
entry.ubl-definition: A reference to a contract associated with this document.
entry.definition: Referencia asociativa con Contratos.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
entry.ubl-definition: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.
entry.definition: Referencia asociativa con Documentos Adicionales.

entry.ubl-definition: Information about a project.
A signature applied to this document.
entry.definition: Asociación con Firmas.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Accounting_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party
entry.ubl-definition: The accounting supplier party.
entry.definition: Asociación con el Contable del Proveedor, el Cobrador.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Accounting_ Customer Party. Customer Party
entry.ubl-definition: The accounting customer party.
entry.definition: Asociación con el Contable del Cliente, el Pagador.

entry.ubl-definition: The payee.
entry.definition: Asociación con el Beneficiario.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party
entry.ubl-definition: The buyer.
entry.definition: Asociación con el Comprador.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party
entry.ubl-definition: The seller.
entry.definition: Asociación con el Vendedor.

entry.ubl-definition: The tax representative.
entry.definition: Asociación con el Representante Fiscal.

entry.ubl-definition: A delivery associated with this document.
entry.definition: Asociación con detalles de la Entrega.

entry.ubl-definition: A set of delivery terms associated with this document.
entry.definition: Asociación con las condiciones de entrega.

entry.ubl-definition: Expected means of payment.
entry.definition: Asociación con los medios de pago.

entry.ubl-definition: A set of payment terms associated with this document.
entry.definition: Asociación con los plazos de pago.

entry.ubl-definition: A prepaid payment.
entry.definition: Asociación con información de anticipo.

entry.ubl-definition: A discount or charge that applies to a price component.
entry.definition: Asociación con cargos o descuentos globales.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Tax_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
entry.ubl-definition: The exchange rate between the document currency and the tax currency.
entry.definition: Asociación de la tasa de cambio entre la moneda de la factura y la moneda de los impuestos.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Pricing_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
entry.ubl-definition: The exchange rate between the document currency and the pricing currency.
entry.definition: Asociación de la tasa de cambio entre la moneda de la factura y la moneda de los precios.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Payment_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
entry.ubl-definition: The exchange rate between the document currency and the payment currency.
entry.definition: Asociación de la tasa de cambio entre la moneda de la factura y la moneda de pago.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Payment Alternative_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
entry.ubl-definition: The exchange rate between the document currency and the payment alternative currency.
entry.business-terms: Tasa de Cambio de Pago Alternativa
entry.definition: Asociación de la tasa de cambio entre la moneda de la factura y la moneda de pago alternativo.

entry.ubl-definition: The total amount of a specific type of tax.
entry.definition: Asociación con la información impuestos totales para cada tipo de impuesto.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Withholding_ Tax Total. Tax Total
entry.ubl-definition: The total withholding tax.

entry.dictionary-entry-name: Invoice. Legal_ Monetary Total. Monetary Total
entry.ubl-definition: The total amount payable on the Invoice, including Allowances, Charges, and Taxes.
entry.definition: Asociación con losl totales legales a pagar de la Factura, incluyendo Descuentos, Cargos e Impuestos.

entry.ubl-definition: A line describing an invoice item.
entry.definition: Asociación con una o más Líneas de Factura.
